```{r}

```
(a)
```{r}
set.seed(1)
sigma = matrix(c(1, 0.25, 0.25, 1), nrow = 2)
data = mvrnorm(n = 500, mu = c(0,0), Sigma = sigma)
```
<br><br>
(b)
```{r}
plot(data[,1], data[,2])
```
<br><br>
(c)
```{r}
abline(a = 0, b = 1)
```
<br><br>
(d)
```{r}
(mu_y = mean(data[,2]))
(mu_x = mean(data[,1]))
(rho = cor(data[,1], data[,2]))
(sig_x = sd(data[,1]))
(sig_y = sd(data[,2]))
```
Therefore, the regression line is -0.0102 + 0.2086 * 1.0082/1.0497 * (x - 0.0463).
Simplified, this equals -0.0308 + 0.2658x
